means: 基督被钉死之地（位于Jerusalem附近），受难的场所，墓地

sentence.Network_en: They came to a place called Golgotha ( which means The Place of the Skull ) .
sentence.Network_cn: 到了一个地方,名叫各各他,意思就是 髑髅 地.

sentence.Network_en: They have the fate to cross over the pass of anguish, the Golgotha of tears.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的命运是去越过痛苦-眼泪的各各他.

sentence.Network_en: Mat 27:33 They came to a place called Golgotha ( which means The Place of the Skull ) .
sentence.Network_cn: 33到了一个地方名叫各各他,意思就是[ 髑髅 地].

PerfectNetExp.abs: golgotha 各各他, golgotha 墓葬, golgotha 墓地
golgivesicle 高尔基泡, golgotha 各各他, golgotha 受难的场所
golgiokinesis 高尔基体分裂, golgotha 受难的场所, golgivesicle 高尔基泡

list.abs: 在受难地星球(planted golgotha)上,战争的厄运转换到了雅瑞克政委一边.碎骨者强大的战力以及残忍暴行般的进攻迅速的摧垮了雅瑞克的装甲部队,甚至让他自己也失去了对抗.

means.word_mean: 1. a hill near Jerusalem where Jesus was crucified
